p: The analysis of P. graveolens leaf EO was performed according to Sharopov et al. [ 19], with small modifications. In brief, the initial GC oven temperature was 56 °C for 2 min and then ramped at 3 °C /min to 200 °C, and finally at 2 °C/min to 220 °C for 3 min. Carrier gas was at a rate of 1.0 mL/min in a splitless mode and the m/ z range was 35−400.
